long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stack is an addictive game available as a Chrome Extension and can be played for free on the website https://classroom-6x.org/. The objective of the game is simple: stack up blocks as high as you can! As the blocks descend from the top of the screen, you need to carefully time and position them to create a tall tower. The challenge lies in maintaining balance and precision as the tower grows taller. One wrong move can cause the blocks to topple, and the game is over. Test your stacking skills, challenge yourself to beat your highest score, and see how high you can build your tower in "Stack"!

*Note: We have added "Classroom 6x, Poki Unblocked" button, making it easy for players to quickly access the games on our website! https://classroom-6x.org/, https://poki.ee/
